version_description:
KNOWN CRASH ON iOS5. PLEASE DO NOT UPDATE IF YOU HAVE NOT UPDATED YOUR iPHONE TO iOS6. FIX COMING ASAP!

★ 2 new cool maps
★ New zombie alterations
★ Background music bug fixed

- Slime zombie fixed (reduced damage and it will show where it will appear)
- Armor bug fixed
:: AI Buddy to help you fight hordes of zombies

2 final China maps!
10 cool weapons
Sweet discounts for our beloved users (You!)

:: NEW MAP! China - Electronics Factory
:: New icons for iOS 7

★ A ton of bugs fixed
★ Spectator mode in co-op when you die

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

3.10 update:
:: Fixed all known issues with squads and tournaments

3.00 update:
:: new in-game currency to purchase premium items!
:: create and join squads
:: tournaments
:: squad events
:: squad chat
:: new player profile
